name: Vinyl
summary_text: A New York music executive in the 1970s hustles to make a career out of the city's diverse music scene.

name: Bar Rescue
summary_text: Jon Taffer, a bar/nightclub consultant, and his team of experts offer their expertise, helping real bar owners "rescue" their failing establishments by overcoming challenges and possibly saving them from closing.

name: Fear Street Part Three: 1666
summary_text: The origins of Sarah Fier's curse are finally revealed as history comes full circle on a night that changes the lives of Shadysiders forever.

name: Song to Song
summary_text: Two intersecting love triangles. Obsession and betrayal set against the music scene in Austin, Texas.

name: Nosferatu
summary_text: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

name: Knots Landing
summary_text: The residents of Knots Landing, a coastal suburb of Los Angeles, deal with various issues such as infidelity, health scares, rape, murder, kidnapping, assassinations, drug smuggling, corporate intrigue and criminal investigations.

name: Tenkuu Shinpan
summary_text: High schooler Yuri finds herself atop a skyscraper in a strange world, where she must survive against masked assailants bent on killing their prey.

name: Velvet Goldmine
summary_text: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

name: Summerland
summary_text: During World War II, an Englishwoman opens her heart to an evacuee after initially resolving to be rid of him in this moving journey of womanhood, love and friendship.

name: In the Heat of the Night
summary_text: A black police detective is asked to investigate a murder in a racially hostile southern town.

name: Shortbus
summary_text: A group of New Yorkers caught up in their romantic-sexual milieu converge at an underground salon infamous for its blend of art, music, politics, and carnality.

name: The Old Man & the Gun
summary_text: Based on the true story of Forrest Tucker and his audacious escape from San Quentin at the age of 70 to an unprecedented string of heists that confounded authorities and enchanted the public.

name: Krull
summary_text: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

name: I'm Not There
summary_text: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.

name: The Exception
summary_text: A German soldier tries to determine if the Dutch resistance has planted a spy to infiltrate the home of Kaiser Wilhelm in Holland during the onset of World War II, but falls for a young Jewish Dutch woman during his investigation.

name: The Spirit
summary_text: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

name: Crank: High Voltage
summary_text: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

name: Dead Man
summary_text: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

name: Yellowstone Kelly
summary_text: In 1870s, in the Sioux territory south of the Missouri, trapper and Indian scout Luther Yellowstone Kelly is hired by the army at Fort Buford but runs into trouble with the Sioux.

name: Pay It Forward
summary_text: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.

name: Tangle
summary_text: A story of two generations of two families colliding, connecting, sometimes at cross purposes as they navigate their way around the maze of love, sex, money and politics.

name: Mes chères études
summary_text: Laura is a 19-year-old university freshman who desperately wants to do well in school. She works a part-time job but cannot make ends meet. One evening in which she is short of funds, she ...                See full summary »

name: Danger Close
summary_text: In August 1966, in a Vietnamese rubber plantation called Long Tan, 108 young and inexperienced Australian and New Zealand soldiers are fighting for their lives against 2500 North Vietnamese and Viet Cong soldiers.

name: The Smurfs
summary_text: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

name: Hollyoaks
summary_text: Hollyoaks takes a look at the lives, loves and careers of a group of teenage friends and their families as they graduate through GCSE's, A-Levels and College into the world of work.

name: The Good German
summary_text: While in post-war Berlin to cover the Potsdam Conference, an American military journalist is drawn into a murder investigation which involves his former mistress and his driver.

name: All Eyez on Me
summary_text: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

name: The Seven Year Itch
summary_text: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbbor.

name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
summary_text: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

name: Summer Catch
summary_text: A rich girl whose family summers on Cape Cod has a romance with a local poor boy who hopes to become a major league baseball player.

name: Adult Material
summary_text: A woman's life working in the adult film industry spans from its seedy beginnings to a highly successful enterprise.

name: Into the Grizzly Maze
summary_text: Two estranged brothers reunite at their childhood home in the Alaskan wild. They set out on a two-day hike and are stalked by an unrelenting grizzly bear.

name: 21 Grams
summary_text: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

name: Lethal Weapon 3
summary_text: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

name: THX 1138
summary_text: In the 25th century, a time when people have designations instead of names, a man, THX 1138, and a woman, LUH 3417, rebel against their rigidly-controlled society.

name: Frankenstein
summary_text: Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.

name: The Little Drummer Girl
summary_text: As a Palestinian assassin is targeting prominent Israelis, a young English actress is recruited by Mossad to infiltrate the assassin's terrorist cell, requiring all of her acting talents but also putting her at considerable risk.

name: The Walk
summary_text: In 1974, high-wire artist Philippe Petit recruits a team of people to help him realize his dream: to walk the immense void between the World Trade Center towers.

name: I Love You, Beth Cooper
summary_text: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for Beth Cooper--the hottest, most popular girl in school--during his graduation speech. That very night, she shows up at his door offering to show him the best night of his life.

name: The Greatest American Hero
summary_text: A teacher is asked to be a superhero using a special alien suit with powers he can barely understand or control.

name: Daddy's Home 2
summary_text: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

name: Down Periscope
summary_text: Lt. Cmdr. Tom Dodge is assigned as Captain to the USS Stingray, an old diesel driven submarine that has seen better days.

name: The Day After
summary_text: The effects of a devastating nuclear holocaust on small-town residents of eastern Kansas.

name: The Wind Rises
summary_text: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

name: Beyond Skyline
summary_text: A tough-as-nails detective embarks on a relentless pursuit to free his son from a nightmarish alien warship.

name: My Friend Dahmer
summary_text: A young Jeffrey Dahmer struggles to belong in high school.

name: Ezel
summary_text: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

name: Thunder in My Heart
summary_text: A group of young friends as they come of age and strive to meet the unexpected demands of adult life while coming to terms with their own identities, pasts, and passions.

name: Masters of the Universe
summary_text: He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe, goes against the evil Skeletor to save the planet Eternia and protect the secrets of Castle Grayskull.

name: Black Bear
summary_text: A filmmaker at a creative impasse seeks solace from her tumultuous past at a rural retreat, only to find that the woods summon her inner demons in intense and surprising ways.

name: John Adams
summary_text: The life of one of the USA's Founding Fathers, its second President, and his role in the nation's first 50 years.

name: Ludo
summary_text: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

name: That Awkward Moment
summary_text: Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"

name: Ray
summary_text: From a satire to a psychological thriller, four short stories from celebrated auteur and writer Satyajit Ray are adapted for the screen in this series.

name: The 12th Man
summary_text: They were 12 saboteurs. The Nazis killed 11 of them. This is the true story of the one that got away.

name: The Drowning
summary_text: Since losing her son eight years ago, Jodie has been rebuilding her life but when she catches sight of Daniel, she is convinced she has found her missing son.

name: The Client List
summary_text: Riley is a single mother living in a small Texas town and leading a shocking double life.

name: Wild Hearts Can't Be Broken
summary_text: Thrilled by a performance she sees at a fair, Sonora tries to land a spot as a daredevil who rides horses off of high dives.

name: The Package
summary_text: Experienced Green Beret sergeant Johnny Gallagher is escorting a prisoner, Airborne Ranger Thomas Boyette, back to the US, but Boyette escapes and Gallagher must risk life and limb to catch him.

name: Go
summary_text: The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view.

name: The Banishing
summary_text: The Banishing tells the story of the most haunted house in England. In the 1930s, a young reverend, his wife and daughter move into a manor with a horrifying secret.

name: First Reformed
summary_text: A minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past.

name: Most Dangerous Game
summary_text: Desperate to take care of his pregnant wife before a terminal illness can take his life, Dodge Maynard accepts an offer to participate in a deadly game where he soon discovers that he's not the hunter - but the prey.

name: Are You Afraid of the Dark?
summary_text: An anthology series that follows different chapters of the Midnight Society, a group of teenagers who gather at midnight to tell scary stories, such as the Carnival of Doom and the Curse of the Shadows.

name: The New Guy
summary_text: A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.

name: Siberia
summary_text: When an American diamond trader's Russian partner goes missing, he journeys to Siberia in search of him, but instead begins a love affair.

name: Super
summary_text: After his wife falls under the influence of a drug dealer, an everyday guy transforms himself into Crimson Bolt, a superhero with the best intentions, but lacking in heroic skills.

name: Life
summary_text: Gail, Belle, David, and Hannah all encounter new and disruptive influences in their lives, kicking off interweaving stories set in a house in Manchester, England, UK, divided into four flats.

name: Stuck in Love.
summary_text: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.

name: Mr. Queen
summary_text: When a modern day chef gets trapped in the body of a queen in the Joseon era, chaos ensues.

name: You Only Live Twice
summary_text: Secret Agent James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.

name: The Square
summary_text: A prestigious Stockholm museum's chief art curator finds himself in times of both professional and personal crisis as he attempts to set up a controversial new exhibit.

name: Silent Hill: Revelation
summary_text: When her adoptive father disappears, Sharon Da Silva is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

name: Dalziel and Pascoe
summary_text: Supt. Dalziel and partner DI Pascoe investigate murders, and find a bond forming between them despite their blatantly differing personalities.

name: Clifford the Big Red Dog
summary_text: A young girl's love for a tiny puppy named Clifford makes the dog grow to an enormous size.

name: Next Friday
summary_text: A streetwise man flees South Central Los Angeles, heading to the suburbs and his lottery-winner uncle and cousin, to avoid a neighborhood thug with a grudge who has just escaped from prison.

name: Thirtysomething
summary_text: Seven thirtysomethings living in Philadelphia struggle with everyday adult angst.

name: The Secret
summary_text: Interviews with self-proclaimed authors, philosophers, scientists, with an in-depth discussion of visualizing your goals. The audience is shown how they can learn and use 'The Secret' in their everyday lives.

name: Don't Trust the B---- in Apartment 23
summary_text: Chloe is a New York party girl with the morals of a pirate. She causes trouble for her naive small town roommate, June, and Chloe's best friend, James Van Der Beek.

name: The Haunting in Connecticut
summary_text: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.

name: Sofia the First
summary_text: Sofia is a little girl with a commoner's background until her mom marries the king and suddenly she is royalty.

name: A Vigilante
summary_text: After escaping her violent husband, Sadie makes it her life's mission to help free others in danger. After months of rigorous training in survival skills, boxing, and lethal martial arts, she is back with a vengeance.

name: Dalui Yeonin - Bobogyungsim Ryeo
summary_text: Korean melodramatic adaptation of Chinese drama Scarlet Heart (2011) follows a woman who travels back in time to the Goryeo Dynasty of Korea whenever a total eclipse of the sun took place.

name: Nine
summary_text: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.

name: The Light Between Oceans
summary_text: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia raise a baby they rescue from a drifting rowing boat.

name: The Kings of Summer
summary_text: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.

name: Leyla and Mecnun
summary_text: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

name: The Discovery
summary_text: Two years after the afterlife is scientifically proven, a man attempts to help a young woman break away from her dark past.

name: Ben 10: Omniverse
summary_text: The continuing adventures of Ben Tennyson (Yuri Lowenthal) and his new partner, Rook Blonko (Bumper Robinson).

name: Fat Girl
summary_text: Two sisters confront their sexual attitudes and experiences while on a family holiday.

name: Payback
summary_text: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

name: Rang De
summary_text: A man and woman have been neighbors since they were children, but they have different perspectives on their relationship.

name: Bless This Mess
summary_text: A newlywed couple's plan to leave the big city for a quieter life in Nebraska doesn't go as expected.

name: Krampus
summary_text: A boy who has a bad Christmas accidentally summons a festive demon to his family home.

name: Hawaii
summary_text: An American missionary and his wife travel to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding there comes tragedy.

name: Domestic Girlfriend
summary_text: Natsuo Fujii is in love with his teacher, Hina. Attempting to forget his feelings towards her, Natsuo goes to a mixer with his classmates where he meets an odd girl named Rui Tachibana. In ...                See full summary »

name: Dead Calm
summary_text: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

name: Jailbait
summary_text: Anna Nix is sent to a juvenile prison for the murder of her abusive stepfather. In the prison, she discovers relationships, drugs, complex mental illness, and her eventual search for redemption.

name: Stir of Echoes
summary_text: After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

name: RoboCop 3
summary_text: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

name: Creepshow
summary_text: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales inspired by the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

name: Code Black
summary_text: The staff of the LA County Hospital emergency room treat patients under difficult circumstances.

name: Aquarius
summary_text: A gritty 1960s cop drama about LAPD detective Sam Hodiak and his trainee, who must deal with gangs, brutal crimes, changing times, family crises and unhinged manipulative small-time crook Charles Manson, who's slowly building his cult.

name: Lab Rats: Bionic Island
summary_text: A scrawny 14-year-old, having discovered his inventor stepdad has three bionic, super-powered teens living cloistered in a secret lab beneath their home, brings them out into the world.

name: The Catch
summary_text: Follows a female private investigator whose career specialty is exposing fraud for a living. She is drawn to a man whose career appears to be committing fraud for a living.

name: Behind The Candelabra
summary_text: A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson.

name: Look Who's Talking
summary_text: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile, the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice-over.

name: Strangers on a Train
summary_text: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

name: London Kills
summary_text: Drama series following the detectives of an elite murder investigation squad in London.

name: Ladyhawke
summary_text: The thief Gaston escapes the dungeon of medieval Aquila through the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.

name: The Taking of Pelham 123
summary_text: Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.

name: The Edge of Sleep
summary_text: When a night watchman finishes his shift at work, he is terrified to discover that everyone in the world who went to sleep the previous night has died. Now he and a band of survivors must ...                See full summary »

name: The Jewel of the Nile
summary_text: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

name: The Owners
summary_text: A group of friends think they find an easy score at an empty house with a safe full of cash. But when the owners, an elderly couple, come home early, the tables are suddenly turned.

name: Alone
summary_text: When an outbreak hits, Aidan barricades himself inside his apartment and starts rationing food. His complex is overrun by infected Screamers, and with the world falling apart into chaos, he is left completely alone fighting for his life.

name: Young Guns II
summary_text: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.

name: Runt
summary_text: Neglected and unsupervised, a group of high school seniors are pulled into a downward cycle of violence.

name: Rose and Maloney
summary_text: Cases of a woman and her male assistant who work for the fictional CJRA (Criminal Justice Review Agency), an organization which seeks out miscarriages of justice.

name: Girl Next
summary_text: A young woman is abducted by a strange group of human traffickers who use drug and trauma based mind control to turn women into "Sofia" dolls. Trapped in a waking nightmare she fights for a way to escape, to avoid becoming Girl Next

name: The Third Man
summary_text: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

name: Beaches
summary_text: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

name: Kill Your Darlings
summary_text: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac, and William Burroughs.

name: Erkenci Kus
summary_text: Sanem, a young girl with aspirations of becoming a writer, is forced by her parents to choose between an arranged marriage and finding a proper job. Rushing into a new job at an advertising company, she soon falls for her boss, Can.

name: Puppy Dog Pals
summary_text: Fun-loving pug puppies, brothers Bingo and Rolly, have thrill-seeking appetites that take them on exhilarating adventures in their neighborhood and around the globe.

name: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds
summary_text: A prequel to Star Trek: The Original Series, the show will follow the crew of the USS Enterprise under Captain Christopher Pike.

name: Scooby Doo, Where Are You!
summary_text: A group of teenage friends and their Great Dane (Scooby-Doo) travel in a bright green van solving strange and hilarious mysteries, while returning from or going to a regular teenage function.

name: The House of Flowers
summary_text: A wealthy matriarch tries to maintain her family's facade of perfection after her husband's mistress exposes their dirty secrets.

name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
summary_text: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

name: Down a Dark Hall
summary_text: A troubled teen named Kit Gordy is forced to join the exclusive Blackwood Boarding School, just to find herself trapped by dark forces around its mysterious headmistress, Madame Duret.

name: Transplant
summary_text: An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine.

name: Living with Yourself
summary_text: An existential comedy about a man struggling in life who undergoes a new treatment to become a better person, only to find that he's been replaced by a new and improved version of himself.

name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
summary_text: In this live-action prequel to The Flintstones (1994), the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma Slaghoople is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller.

name: The Priest
summary_text: A priest and a police officer are trying to solve a set of mysterious suicides. As their investigation closes in, they discover another crime with even farther-reaching consequences.

name: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
summary_text: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.

name: The New Edition Story
summary_text: Chronicles the ups and downs of legendary music group New Edition from their humble beginnings in Boston to individual solo success and everything in between.

name: Agatha Christie's Miss Marple: 4:50 from Paddington
summary_text: A friend of Miss Marple's sees a woman being strangled in a passing train. When police cannot find a body and doubt the story, Miss Marple enlists professional housekeeper, Lucy Eyelesbarrow, to go undercover.

name: City of Angels
summary_text: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

name: Obsessed
summary_text: A successful asset manager, who has just received a huge promotion, is blissfully happy in his career and in his marriage. But when a temp worker starts stalking him, all the things he's worked so hard for are placed in jeopardy.

name: Wonder Woman
summary_text: It's the modern day, and being Wonder Woman is complicated. Diana is leading a triple life - running a large corporation out of costume and fighting crime in costume in one identity.

name: T.J. Hooker
summary_text: The weekly adventures of tough-as-nails veteran police officer Sgt. T.J. Hooker, who rides the beat with his rookie partner Vince Romano.

name: Bad Sister
summary_text: A student at a Catholic school has suspicions when one of the nuns begins acting creepily towards her brother. But she can't tell anyone, because who would believe that a woman of God would do such a thing?

name: Body of Evidence
summary_text: A lawyer defends a woman accused of killing her older lover by having sex with him.

name: Nebraska
summary_text: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

name: Unpregnant
summary_text: A 17-year old Missouri teen named Veronica discovers she has gotten pregnant, a development that threatens to end her dreams of matriculating at an Ivy League college, and the career that will follow.

name: Still Waiting...
summary_text: Dennis is still waiting to progress to district manager from the restaurant where he works.

name: Dream On
summary_text: Martin Tupper is a book editor in Manhattan, recently divorced from Judith, a psychologist. Martin's life is filled with fantasies and sexual thoughts, many times coming in the form of black-and-white shots from old TV shows and movies.

name: Punky Brewster
summary_text: Young Punky Brewster is abandoned with her dog, Brandon, in a supermarket. When she befriends Henry Warnimont, her new family life begins.

name: Rocco
summary_text: A behind-the-scene account of the porn world and its stars as they've never been seen before - and the no-holds-barred portrait of a true giant.

name: The Game Plan
summary_text: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

name: Beavis and Butt-Head
summary_text: Animated MTV series about two teenage heavy-metal music fans who occasionally do idiotic things because they're bored. For them, everything is "cool" or "sucks."

name: Step Up: High Water
summary_text: Based on the Step Up franchise, the series tells the story of the students and teachers at High Water Performing Arts School in Atlanta.

name: Rope
summary_text: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

name: The Space Between Us
summary_text: The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street-smart girl to discover how he came to be.

name: A Dangerous Method
summary_text: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

name: Down by Love
summary_text: Based on a true story, the impossible love between a prison director and one of its female inmates.

name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
summary_text: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

name: The Eight Hundred
summary_text: From the acclaimed filmmaker behind Mr. Six comes a riveting war epic. In 1937, eight hundred Chinese soldiers fight under siege from a warehouse in the middle of the Shanghai battlefield, completely surrounded by the Japanese army.

name: How to Marry a Millionaire
summary_text: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

name: The Five Heartbeats
summary_text: The story of the rise and fall of an African American vocal group.

name: Return to Me
summary_text: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

name: The English Game
summary_text: The story of the invention of football and how it quickly rose to become the world's most popular game by crossing class divides.

name: The Staircase
summary_text: A man, grieving the death of his wife who fell down a staircase, is accused of murdering her.

name: The Victim
summary_text: A mother seeks the whereabouts of her son's killer after he is released from prison, unleashing a series of events that surface tragic memories and unexpected consequences.

name: Dead Ringers
summary_text: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

name: Barnaby Jones
summary_text: The exploits of milk-swilling, geriatric private eye Barnaby Jones.

name: Shark Night
summary_text: A weekend at a lake house in the Louisiana Gulf turns into a nightmare for seven vacationers as they are subjected to shark attacks.

name: The Wife
summary_text: A wife questions her life choices as she travels to Stockholm to see her husband receive the Nobel Prize for Literature.

name: Blue Heelers
summary_text: The series primarily focuses on the daily lives of Victorian police officers working at a police station in the fictional small town of Mount Thomas.

name: The Sleepover
summary_text: When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

name: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
summary_text: The two top Agents of the United Network Command for Law and Enforcement (U.N.C.L.E.) fight the enemies of peace, particularly the forces of T.H.R.U.S.H.

name: A Monster Calls
summary_text: A boy seeks the help of a tree monster to cope with his single mother's terminal illness.

name: Blue Ruin
summary_text: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.

name: Broken City
summary_text: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.

name: Mom and Dad
summary_text: A teenage girl and her younger brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origin causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

name: Pachchis
summary_text: Abhiram is losing control of his gambling addiction and needs a lot of money and quick. Desperate, he inserts himself into a political feud. He soon finds that it's a thin line between gambling with money and gambling with your life.

name: Crime Scene Kitchen
summary_text: A culinary guessing game in which bakers must decode what type of dessert was made, when all that's left are a few clues. They have to recreate the recipe and the jury will determine how closely it matches the missing dessert.

name: Thief
summary_text: An ace safe cracker wants to do one last big heist for the mob before going straight.

name: Colonia
summary_text: A young woman's desperate search for her abducted boyfriend draws her into the infamous Colonia Dignidad, a sect nobody has ever escaped from.

name: The Hardy Boys
summary_text: When the Hardy boys, Frank and Joe and their father, Fenton arrive in Bridgeport they set out to uncover the truth behind the recent tragedy that has changed their lives, and in doing so, uncover something much more sinister.

name: Sanctuary
summary_text: Stem cells, gene therapy, transplants, and cloning have changed the definition of "humanity" in the modern world, but the darker side contains monsters that only few are brave enough to face, because the future lies in their hands.

name: Rust and Bone
summary_text: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

name: Johnny English
summary_text: After a sudden attack on MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident, yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.

name: Biography: WWE Legends
summary_text: Features eight original two-hour documentaries showcasing the stories behind some of the most memorable WWE Superstars of all time.

name: Anger Management
summary_text: Ex baseball player Charlie is an anger management therapist with small group sessions at home. He has an OCD teen daughter, an ex-wife and a sex buddy/therapist.

name: Martin
summary_text: Sassy sitcom centering on radio and television personality Martin Payne. Series focuses on his romantic relationship with girlfriend Gina, her best friend Pam and escapades with best friends Tommy and Cole.

name: Topper Returns
summary_text: A fun-loving young woman is murdered after trading bedrooms with her wealthy friend. Her ghost seeks aid from Topper to find the murderer.

name: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
summary_text: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

name: The Hungover Games
summary_text: A spoof on The Hangover (2009), The Hunger Games (2012) and other movies, TV series etc. 4 men, with hangovers after a bachelor party, find themselves in a future, dystopian, kill or be killed game.

name: The Exorcist III
summary_text: A police Lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.

name: Star Trek: Generations
summary_text: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

name: Bedtime Stories
summary_text: A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

name: Coupling
summary_text: Six best friends talk about all aspects of sex and relationships on their never-ending quest to find true love.

name: The Chase
summary_text: Contestants competing against a professional quizzer, known as the Chaser, whose aim is to prevent the contestants from winning a cash prize.

name: Inside Look: The People v. O.J. Simpson - American Crime Story
summary_text: Inside the series of the same name.

name: Dreamcatcher
summary_text: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

name: Home Alone 3
summary_text: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

name: Teen Witch
summary_text: High school misfit Louise, at a loss for romance, discovers magical abilities, but the teenage witch finds that she cannot conjure herself true love, so what?

name: The Siege of Jadotville
summary_text: Irish Commandant Pat Quinlan leads a stand off with troops against French and Belgian Mercenaries in the Congo during the early 1960s.

name: Exorcist: The Beginning
summary_text: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

name: Rounders
summary_text: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

name: The Bounty
summary_text: Fed up with their Captain's harsh discipline, a sailing ship's crew decides to take action.

name: Thirst
summary_text: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

name: The Retirement Plan
summary_text: In The Retirement Plan, when Ashley (Ashley Greene) and her young daughter Sarah (Thalia Campbell) get caught up in a criminal enterprise that puts their lives at risk, she turns to the ...                See full summary »

name: Three Colors: Red
summary_text: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

name: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
summary_text: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

name: Pleasure
summary_text: 19-year-old Linnéa leaves her small town life in Sweden for Los Angeles to become Jessica, the world's next big porn star. But the road to her goal turns out to be bumpier than she imagined.

name: Bowfinger
summary_text: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

name: Pretty Little Liars: The Perfectionists
summary_text: Everything about the town of Beacon Heights seems perfect, but in the aftermath of the town's first murder, behind every Perfectionist hides secrets, lies and much needed alibies.

name: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs
summary_text: Joe Bob is back! Watching B-Movies and giving background and behind the scenes information. He watches Tourist Trap, Re-Animator and much much more.

name: Fate/Zero
summary_text: Seven chosen mages and their summoned heroic spirits fight against each other to try and win the Holy Grail: a magical device that can grant any wish.

name: Dash & Lily
summary_text: A whirlwind holiday romance builds as cynical Dash and optimistic Lily trade dares, dreams and desires in the notebook they pass back and forth at locations all across New York City.

name: Dragonfly
summary_text: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his deceased wife through his patients' near death experiences.

name: Retribution
summary_text: A horrific murder rocks the lives of two families living side-by-side in isolated rural Scotland.

name: Tales from the Darkside: The Movie
summary_text: A young boy tells three stories of horror to distract a witch who plans to eat him.

name: Richie Rich
summary_text: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

name: Adventures of Superman
summary_text: The Man of Steel fights crime with help from his friends at the Daily Planet.

name: Convoy
summary_text: Truckers form a mile long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.

name: Runaway Bride
summary_text: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiancés at the altar.

name: That's So Raven
summary_text: A teenage girl periodically receives brief psychic visions of the near future. Trying to make these visions come true results in trouble, and hilarious situations, for the girl and her friends.

name: The Very Excellent Mr. Dundee
summary_text: Paul Hogan is reluctantly thrust back into the spotlight as he desperately attempts to restore his sullied reputation on the eve of being knighted.

name: The High and the Mighty
summary_text: When a commercial airliner develops engine problems on a trans-Pacific flight and the pilot loses his nerve, it is up to the washed-up co-pilot Dan Roman to bring the plane in safely.

name: The Chaser
summary_text: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

name: The Secret Circle
summary_text: 16 year old Cassie Blake moves to Chance Harbor, Washington to live with her grandmother after her mother mysteriously dies. She discovers she's a witch along with 5 other teens.

name: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
summary_text: Improvisational comedy competition show in which four members of the regular cast as comedians and often with guest appearances with other comedians and celebrities and members of the audience perform various comic games and sketches.

name: Garfield
summary_text: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

name: Snatch
summary_text: A group of up-and-coming hustlers who stumble upon a truck-load of stolen gold bullion are suddenly thrust into the high-stakes world of organized crime.

name: Eragon
summary_text: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

name: Tristan + Isolde
summary_text: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne and the princess of the feuding Irish spells doom for the young lovers.

name: Trick 'r Treat
summary_text: Five interwoven stories that occur on Halloween: An everyday high school principal has a secret life as a serial killer; a college virgin might have just met the guy for her; a group of teenagers pull a mean prank; a woman who loathes the night has to contend with her holiday-obsessed husband; and a mean old man meets his match with a demonic, supernatural trick-or-treater.

name: Willow
summary_text: TV adaptation of the fantasy film 'Willow', which centered on a dwarf farmer who does magic.

name: A Vineyard Romance
summary_text: When Seattle magazine writer Samantha Hart is sent home to write an article about the wedding destination of Hawthorne Vineyards, she discovers the ex who broke her heart not only runs the vineyard, but he's about to get married there.

name: His Girl Friday
summary_text: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

name: The Little Hours
summary_text: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation.

Five carnival workers are kidnapped and held hostage in an abandoned, hellish compound where they are forced to participate in a violent game, the goal of which is to survive twelve hours against a gang of sadistic clowns.

name: Mixed-ish
summary_text: Follows Bow's parents, Paul and Alicia, who are forced to move from a hippie commune to the suburbs to better provide for their family after the dissolution of their cult.

name: Turkish Delight
summary_text: A young love faces with old problems.

name: The World at War
summary_text: A groundbreaking 26-part documentary series narrated by the actor Laurence Olivier about the deadliest conflict in history, World War II.

name: Mistresses
summary_text: Follows the scandalous lives of a group of four girlfriends, each on her own path to self-discovery as they brave the turbulent journey together.

name: Fallen
summary_text: A young girl finds herself in a reform school after therapy since she was blamed for the death of a young boy. At the school she finds herself drawn to a fellow student, unaware that he is an angel, and has loved her for thousands of years.

name: Step Up Revolution
summary_text: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

name: Z-O-M-B-I-E-S
summary_text: Students from Zombietown are transferred to a high school in a suburban town preoccupied with uniformity, traditions and pep rallies.

name: Ackley Bridge
summary_text: The merging of two schools causes plenty of problems for headmistress Mandy who has to deal with explosive fall-outs and problem pupils.

name: The Falcon in Danger
summary_text: When a passenger plane crash lands at a local airport, bystanders and first responders are shocked to find there is no one aboard.

name: The River Wild
summary_text: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

name: The Rose
summary_text: The tragic life of a self-destructive female rock star who struggles to deal with the constant pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless business manager.

name: Funny People
summary_text: When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship causes him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.

name: The Awakening
summary_text: In 1921, England is overwhelmed by the loss and grief of World War I. Hoax exposer Florence Cathcart visits a boarding school to explain sightings of a child ghost. Everything she believes unravels as the 'missing' begin to show themselves.

This series took place in an apartment building numbered 227. The cast would frequently be sitting outside on a large set of stone stairs, involved in some discussion that would unfold into the weekly plotline.

name: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
summary_text: It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.

name: Shithouse
summary_text: A lonely college freshman forges a strong connection with his resident assistant during a fraternity party.
